title: U.S. Reserve Assets Abroad: Special Drawing Rights (DISCONTINUED)
notes: This series has been discontinued as a result of the comprehensive restructuring of the international economic accounts (https://apps.bea.gov/scb/pdf/2014/07%20July/0714_annual_international_transactions_accounts.pdf). For a crosswalk of the old and new series in FRED see http://research.stlouisfed.org/CompRevisionReleaseID49.xlsx.
